function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased airborne infection risk due to uncontrolled natural ventilation and high CO2 levels in office","Impact":"Higher risk of infection when windows are shut, potentially leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular opening of ventilation openings like windows and doors to allow for air exchange","Technologies":"CO2 monitoring sensors, ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the office, visitors, and neighboring offices","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and occupants"},{"Description":"Seasonal variation in airborne infection risk due to changes in outdoor air supply","Impact":"Double the airborne infection risk in winter compared to summer due to decreased outdoor air supply","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation and air exchange during winter months, implement air purification systems","Technologies":"Seasonal HVAC adjustments, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Students, teachers, and school staff","Owner":"School administration, facility management"}]}
